com.redhat.rhn.taskomatic.task.threaded

Interface QueueDriver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChannelRepodataDriver, ErrataCacheDriver, ErrataQueueDriver

    public interface QueueDriver
    "Driver" for a work queue of worker threads

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canContinue()
      Logic to tell the queue when to stop running Queues will always stop when there is no more work to do.
      java.util.List getCandidates()
      List of work items to "prime" the queue
      org.apache.log4j.Logger getLogger()
      The logger to use for all logging operations
      int getMaxWorkers()
      Maximum number of worker threads to run
      void initialize()
      Actions that has to be executed, when queue is created
      QueueWorker makeWorker(java.lang.Object workItem)
      Create a worker instance to work on a particular work item

      Set the logger to use for all logging operations

        Set the logger to use for all logging operations
        Parameters:

        The logger to use for all logging operations

      • getCandidates

        java.util.List getCandidates()
        List of work items to "prime" the queue

        list of work items

      • getMaxWorkers

        int getMaxWorkers()
        Maximum number of worker threads to run
        Returns:
        number of worker threads

      • makeWorker

        QueueWorker makeWorker(java.lang.Object workItem)
        Create a worker instance to work on a particular work item
        Parameters:
        workItem - object contained in the list returned from getCandidates()
        Returns:
        worker instance

      • canContinue

        boolean canContinue()
        Logic to tell the queue when to stop running Queues will always stop when there is no more work to do. This method can return false to cause the queue to stop early.
        Returns:
        true if processing can continue, otherwise false

      • initialize

        void initialize()
        Actions that has to be executed, when queue is created
